Posts.EditableText: Is ActiveLit down for anybody else? And is there any word on when it might return?
Posts.HTML: Is ActiveLit down for anybody else? And is there any word on when it might return?

Posts.EditableText: At the moment I would say yes, Activelit is down. This could change again if the website operator changes, but there is no exact information about this so far.
Posts.HTML: At the moment I would say yes, Activelit is down. This could change again if the website operator changes, but there is no exact information about this so far.

Posts.EditableText: The domain name expired. Manowar has said it has now been renewed, and it should be back soon, but what counts as soon I do not know.
Posts.HTML: The domain name expired. Manowar has said it has now been renewed, and it should be back soon, but what counts as soon I do not know.

Posts.EditableText: Looks like it is up again.
